xint::not_a_number

xint::not_a_number Class Reference

Exception class. More...

#include <xint.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 not_a_number (const std::string &what="attempted to use a Not-a-Number")

Detailed Description

Exception class.

Derived from std::runtime_error.

Note:
Cannot (presently) be blocked.
Remarks:
Most library functions will throw an xint::not_a_number exception if you try to use a Not-a-Number value in them.
An object of type xint::not_a_number can also be fed to an integer constructor to deliberately produce a Not-a-Number value.
See this page for details on Not-a-Number.
